column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Absolutely amazing experience! As other reviewers have mentioned
column2: the "Paella Mixta" is a MUST. Other favorites: spicy potatoes
column5: and the tortilla espanola. SO GOOD!! We followed our lovely server's suggestion to order 2-3 tapas per person and it was way too much food for us personally
column6: but they were kind about our failure to finish our food and brought boxes. All dishes were excellent reheated the next morning as well.
